posts.postText:
Hey guys, its the odd ones brother and yes i did mess up the goldcraft server once but dont be mad D:

i walked in the room to check on him, (he just got his wisdom teeth removed) and i told him to take a nap

Anyways I noticed that he is talking to ppl on skype and steam and i wanted to tell you not to get mad at him anesthesia takes a while to wear off 

he doesent even know how he got here, so dont be mad he should be more sane in the morning
Were you the one who fucked up my house :|
i do long time ago like october
